properties.site_addre: Si Rusa May Lane, Bath, BA1 3QF
properties.location_d: Front & rear garden at Si Rusa
properties.descriptio: B&NES Council determined the Land at SiRusa as Contaminated Land on the basis of lead contamination in the front garden and a lead hotspot in the rear garden.
properties.remediatio: Remediation Statement Date 26/03/14.  Remediation Verification Report 05/02/14
properties.descript_2: The land has been remediated in accordance with the Remediation Statement by B&NES Council.

properties.descriptio: B&NES Council determined the Land at Milvidon as Contaminated Land on the basis of BaP contamination in the rear garden.
properties.remediatio: Remediation Statement Date 26/03/14.  Remediation Verification Report 06/02/14
properties.descript_2: The land has been remediated in accordance with the Remediation Statement by B&NES Council

properties.descriptio: B&NES Council determined the Land of the rear garden of 11 Evelyn Road as Contaminated Land based on a significant possibility of significant harm in relation to a hotspot of benzo(a)pyrene (BaP).
properties.descript_1: On the basis of the evidence presented by further investigations undertaken at the Property 20/10/11, B&NES Council consider that linkages involving BaP do not bring about the significant possibility of significant harm.

properties.descriptio: B&NES Council determined the Land of the rear garden of 15 Evelyn Road as Contaminated Land based on a significant possibility of significant harm in relation to a hotspot of benzo(a)pyrene (BaP).
properties.descript_1: On the basis of the evidence presented by further investigations undertaken at the Property 20/10/11, B&NES Council consider that linkages involving BaP do not bring about the significant possibility of significant harm.

properties.descriptio: B&NES Council determined the land of the front garden of 46 Newbridge Hill as Contaminated Land on the basis of a hotspot of benzo(a)pyrene.
properties.remediatio: Remediation Statement Date 26/03/14.  Remediation Verification Report 06/02/14
properties.descript_2: The land has been remediated in accordance with the Remediation Statement by B&NES Council.

properties.site_addre: Land between 16 & 24 Dapps Hill, Keynsham, BS31 1ES
properties.location_d: Parcel of land between former gas works site and 16 Dapps Hill
properties.descriptio: B&NES Council determined the land as Contaminated Land based on a significant possibility of significant harm in relation to cyanides.
properties.descript_2: The land has been remediated in accordance with the Remediation Statement by B&NES Council.
